- - - 

Mongo Wrestling Alliance is an upcoming animated comedy from Tommy Blacha, co-creator of Adult Swim comedy Metalocalypse. 

Originally called The Galaxy Wrestling Alliance, the show's name was changed prior to it's debut. The show has been scheduled for a 10 episode first season. While previously scheduled to premiere in February 2010, the debut was pushed back to October 2010. 

http://adultswim.wikia.com/wiki/Mongo_Wrestling_Alliance

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mongo_Wrestling_Alliance
